page.title: 08SHOPS AND TRADE
page.content: There is one new shopping complex in the centre of Glengormley with 12 units. This is the Farmley Shopping Centre behind which is located the main car park for the Village Centre. Further expansion of commercial and shopping facilities are restricted by close housing development and lack of available space. Several larger warehouse type furniture and D.I.Y. stores are located close to the centre in Glenwell Road. Shops surveyed in the area show that Thursday, Friday, Saturday are their busiest days and that the majority of shops stay open 6 days a week.
